name: Project Rebound
description: College enrollment support and peer mentorship for formerly incarcerated students at CSU
fullDescription: Project Rebound helps formerly incarcerated individuals earn college degrees at California State University campuses, providing support services and a community of peers.
whatTheyOffer:
- CSU admission support
- Financial aid navigation
- Academic advising and tutoring
- Peer mentorship from formerly incarcerated students
- Career development
- Community and belonging
- Available at multiple CSU campuses
howToGetIt:
1. Contact Project Rebound at your desired CSU
2. Complete intake and assessment
3. Receive application support
4. Enroll at CSU campus
5. Access ongoing support services
6. Join peer community
keywords: Project Rebound, CSU, California State University, formerly incarcerated, college degree, financial aid, peer mentorship, academic support, reentry
